person.persName: John J. Boley (Todd County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Todd County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Son of Nancy Boley. Married to Weltha Ann F. Scott Boley in Todd County, Kentucky, in March 1857. Father of Nancy A. L . Boley, Mary W. Boley, Thalmirah Boley, John D. Boley, and Nathan S. Boley. Farmer and student in Todd County in 1850. Farmer in Todd County in 1860. Farmer in Todd County in 1864.
